blogPost.excerpt: This is an on demand financial services marketplace. You can immediately connect with Finance, Accounting and Investing professionals. If you are a finance/accounting professional, you can connect with clients easily. Product Link: Doughflowclub.com

localize.description: 这是一个按需金融服务市场。您可以立即与金融、会计和投资专业人士建立联系。如果你是一个金融/会计专业人士，你可以轻松地与客户联系。产品链接。Doughflowclub.com

previous.excerpt: Mobilo Wood Card resembles the ecological aspirations of our brand. With this brand new, one-of-its-kind, NFC-powered, smart business card, we want to provide an opportunity for companies to truly distance themselves from paper waste.
previous.title: Mobilo Wood - Smart business card made of wood

localize.description: 美宝乐木卡与我们品牌的生态诉求相仿。我们希望通过这种全新的、独一无二的、由NFC驱动的智能名片，为企业提供一个真正远离纸张浪费的机会。
美寶樂木卡與我們品牌的生態訴求相仿。我們希望通過這種全新的、獨一無二的、由NFC驅動的智能名片，爲企業提供一個真正遠離紙張浪費的機會。
